description_en: Input file name
description_zh: 输入fasta序列搜索文件

description_en: Word size for wordfinder algorithm (length of best perfect match)
description_zh: 字符搜索算法的字节长度

description_en: Restrict search of database to include only the specified taxonomy IDs(multiple IDs delimited by ',')
description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为仅包括指定的分类ID（多个用,隔开)

description_en: Filter query sequence with SEG (Format: 'yes', 'window locut hicut', or 'no' to disable)
description_zh: 用SEG过滤查询序列

description_en: Restrict search of database to everything except the specified taxonomy IDs
description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为除指定的分类ID外的所有内容

description_en: Maximum number of aligned sequences to keep
description_zh: 该值表示，对于每一条查询序列比对结果中保留的最大数量的参考序列。

description_en: Set maximum number of HSPs per subject sequence to save for each query
description_zh: 该值表示，对于每一条查询序列比对结果中的每一条参考序列，保留的高分片断配对的最大数量。

description_en: Scoring matrix name (normally BLOSUM62)
description_zh: 打分矩阵名称(默认 BLOSUM62)

description_en: Use lower case filtering in query and subject sequence(s)?
description_zh: 是否对查询序列和参考序列的小写字母进行过滤？

description_en: Word size for wordfinder algorithm (length of best perfect match)
description_zh: 字符搜索算法的字节长度

description_en: Restrict search of database to include only the specified taxonomy IDs(multiple IDs delimited by ',')
description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为仅包括指定的分类ID（多个用,隔开)

description_en: Filter query sequence with SEG (Format: 'yes', 'window locut hicut', or 'no' to disable)
description_zh: 用SEG过滤查询序列

description_en: Restrict search of database to everything except the specified taxonomy IDs
description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为除指定的分类ID外的所有内容

description_en: Set maximum number of HSPs per subject sequence to save for each query
description_zh: 该值表示，对于每一条查询序列比对结果中的每一条参考序列，保留的高分片断配对的最大数量。

description_en: Scoring matrix name (normally BLOSUM62)
description_zh: 打分矩阵名称(默认 BLOSUM62)

description_en: Use lower case filtering in query and subject sequence(s)?
description_zh: 是否对查询序列和参考序列的小写字母进行过滤？

description_en: Cost to open a gap
description_zh: 新建一个空位的罚分。

description_en: Cost to extend a gap
description_zh: 拓展一个空位的罚分

description_en: Use composition-based statistics: D or d: default (equivalent to 2 ) ;0 or F or f: No composition-based statistics;1: Composition-based statistics as in NAR 29:2994-3005, 2001;2 or T or t : Composition-based score adjustment as in Bioinformatics;3: Composition-based score adjustment as in Bioinformatics 21:902-911
description_zh: 使用基于成分的统计

description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为仅包括指定的分类ID（多个用,隔开)

description_en: Task to execute
description_zh: 执行任务名称

description_en: Query strand(s) to search against database/subject
description_zh: 该值表示查询序列使用何种方向进行序列搜索。

description_en: Reward for a nucleotide match
description_zh: 核苷酸错配罚分

description_en: Penalty for a nucleotide mismatch
description_zh: 核苷酸配置加分

description_en: Restrict search of database to everything except the specified taxonomy IDs
description_zh: 将数据库搜索限制为除指定的分类ID外的所有内容

description_en: Maximum number of aligned sequences to keep
description_zh: 该值表示，对于每一条查询序列比对结果中保留的最大数量的参考序列。

description_en: Set maximum number of HSPs per subject sequence to save for each query
description_zh: 该值表示，对于每一条查询序列比对结果中的每一条参考序列，保留的高分片断配对的最大数量。

description_en: Use lower case filtering in query and subject sequence(s)?
description_zh: 是否对查询序列和参考序列的小写字母进行过滤？

description_en: Cost to open a gap
description_zh: 新建一个空位的罚分。

description_en: Cost to extend a gap
description_zh: 拓展一个空位的罚分

description_en: Filter query sequence with DUST (Format: 'yes', 'level window linker', or 'no' to disable)
description_zh: DUST查询序列过滤器配置。

description_en: Number of threads (CPUs) to use in the BLAST search
description_zh: Blast 搜索使用的线程数

description_en: alignment view options
description_zh: 比对结果的展示形式

description_en: Blast component :blastn blastp blastx tblastn tblasx
description_zh: Blast组件:blastn blastp blastx tblastn tblasx

description_en: path of blast database by CNGBdb team provided
description_zh: 由CNGBdb 团队预设blast数据库的文件路径，可在详情页查看

description_en: Expectation value (E) threshold for saving hits
description_zh: 比对结果筛选期望值，即E-value。取值必须大于0。

description_en: docker of blast software
description_zh: blast软件的docker地址

description_en: User-defined file of blast database
description_zh: 用户自定义blast数据库文件

description_en: data type of user-defined file of blast database
description_zh: 用户自定义blast数据库文件数据类型，核酸或者蛋白质
